SEARCH
Module sc2002OOP
Package sc2002OOP.obj.company

Class CompanyManager

java.lang.Object
sc2002OOP.obj.company.CompanyManager
public class CompanyManager extends Object

Company Data Manager

This class serves as the dedicated manager for all Company objects within the IPMS. It is responsible for handling the initialization, persistence, and retrieval of the entire collection of company records.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Kee Kai Wen, Kelvin Tay Wei Jie, Koay Jun Zhi, Lim Jia Wei Jerald, Teo Kai Jie
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static CompanyManager getInstance()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the CompanyManager. If the instance does not exist, it loads company data from the file and creates the instance.
      Returns:
      The single instance of the CompanyManager.

    • close

      public static void close()
      Saves the current list of companies to the file and destroys the singleton instance. This method should be called before the application closes to ensure data persistence.

    • retrieveCompanies

      public static ArrayList<Company> retrieveCompanies()
      Reads and deserializes the Company list from the persistent storage file.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all loaded Company objects, or an empty list if the file is empty or an error occurs.

    • saveCompanies

      public static void saveCompanies(ArrayList<Company> companies)
      Serializes and writes the current list of Company objects to the persistent storage file.
      Parameters:
      companies - The ArrayList of Company objects to be saved.

    • getLastID

      public static int getLastID()
      Retrieves the last calculated sequential ID used for a company.
      Returns:
      The last sequential ID number.

    • setLastID

      public static void setLastID(int lastID)
      Sets the last calculated sequential ID used for a company.
      Parameters:
      lastID - The new last sequential ID number.

    • getCompanies

      public static ArrayList<Company> getCompanies()
      Retrieves the complete list of all Company entities currently managed in memory.
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of all company entities.

    • getCompanyByID

      public static Company getCompanyByID(String companyID)
      Retrieves a specific Company entity by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      companyID - The unique ID of the company to find.
      Returns:
      The matching Company object, or null if no company with the given ID exists.

    • setCompanies

      public static void setCompanies(ArrayList<Company> companies)
      Replaces the current list of managed companies with a new list.
      Parameters:
      companies - The new ArrayList of Company entities to set.
